title: [PS3] Dead Space Ignition
description:
<a href="http://www.ea.com/dead-space-ignition" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.ea.com/dead-space-ignition</a>

Dead Space Ignition is an interactive digital graphic novel melded with three tense hacking mini-games that takes place on the Sprawl, allowing players to witness the initial Necromorph outbreak before the events of Dead Space 2.

Guide engineers Franco and Sarah as they desperately race to stem the monstrous tide using a trio of quick-thinking tests; Hardware Crack, Trace Route and System Override. Each hacking challenge offers a fun and satisfying arcade experience that will test players with puzzles and twitch gameplay alike.

Dead Space IgnitionÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s core is a unique Ã¢â‚¬Å“Choose Your Own AdventureÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ type narrative, challenging players to survive the horrific Necromorph outbreak in multiple ways. The game offers four unique endings and upon completion of each one, players will be rewarded with unlocks including an exclusive suit, all of which can be used by Isaac Clarke in Dead Space 2.

* Hack Through an Interactive Comic Prequel to Dead Space 2 events preceding Dead Space 2
* Engage in three unique hacking mini-games: Hardware Crack, Trace Route and System Override
* "Choose Your Own Adventures" with multiple paths to survival and four unique endings.
* Earn exclusiverewards and unlocks, for use in Dead Space 2
